comments.body: We are very pleased to offer the Bitcointalk community the very special FIFA tournament designed for our beloved football fans.Please take into account the following:  The link used in that thread is a referral link for us to trace the output of the campaign. By clicking on the link, you will be redirected to the Terms of Conditions of the tournament. We kindly ask you to become familiar with the conditions: the more carefully you read the rules, the less likely you are to make mistakes when participating in the tournament.  Only bets placed on the World Cup 2022 will count for the tournament - the offer only includes pre-match accumulator bets with 3 or more selections, each at odds of 1.4 placed on with a minimum stake of 5 EUR. You need to be registered and verified to take part.  The offer is available explicitly for Fiat deposits. In order to register via an app just scan the QR-code of the store of your choice. The applications are beta versions.  By clicking on the bitcointalk link in my signature, you can find the ANN thread about the MegaPari platform. There I've tried to answer all the questions that appeared regarding the license, payment policy, available GEOs, providers etc. But anyway, feel free to ask further questions. Let's get it started!

comments.body: Today MegaPari is going to sum up the results of the tournament - we announce 100 participants who are lucky to get freebets right on their MegaPari account. Thanks everyone for taking part! Stay tuned!
